words.translation: Except|Iblis|he was arrogant|and became|of|the disbelievers

translations.1: Illaaa Iblees; stakbara Wa-kaana minal kaafireen
translations.15: but not Iblîs, who acted arrogantly, becoming unfaithful

words.translation: He said|O Iblis!|What|prevented you|that|you (should) prostrate|to (one) whom|I created|with My Hands|Are you arrogant|or|are you|of|the exalted ones

translations.1: Qaala yaaa-Ibleesu maa mana'aka an tasjuda limaa khalaqtu bi-yadaiyya-'a stakbarta am kunta min al-'aaleen
translations.15: Allah asked, “O Iblîs! What prevented you from prostrating to what I created with My Own Hands? Did you ˹just˺ become proud? Or have you always been arrogant?”

words.translation: He said|I am|better|than him|You created me|from|fire|and You created him|from|clay

translations.1: Qaala ana khairum minhu; khalaqtanee min naarinw Wa-khalaqtahoo min teen
translations.15: He replied, “I am better than he is: You created me from fire and him from clay.”

words.translation: He said|Then get out|of it|for indeed you|(are) accursed

translations.1: Qaala fakhruj minhaa fa-innaka rajeem
translations.15: Allah commanded, “Then get out of Paradise, for you are truly cursed

words.translation: And indeed|upon you|(is) My curse|until|(the) Day|(of) Judgment

translations.1: Wa-inna 'alaika la'nateee ilaa Yawmid Deen
translations.15: And surely upon you is My condemnation until the Day of Judgment.”

words.translation: He said|My Lord!|Then give me respite|until|(the) Day|they are resurrected

translations.1: Qaala Rabbi fa-anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
translations.15: Satan appealed, “My Lord! Then delay my end until the Day of their resurrection.”

words.translation: He said|Then indeed you|(are) of|those given respite

translations.1: Qaala fa-innaka minal munzareen
translations.15: Allah said, “You will be delayed

words.translation: Until|(the) Day|(of) the time|well-known

translations.1: Ilaa Yawmil waqtil ma'loom
translations.15: until the appointed Day.”

words.translation: He said|Then by Your might|I will surely mislead them|all

translations.1: Qaala fa-bi-'izzatika la-ughwiyannahum ajma'een
translations.15: Satan said, “By Your Glory! I will certainly mislead them all

words.translation: Except|Your slaves|among them|the chosen ones

translations.1: Illaa 'ibaadaka minhumul mukhlaseen
translations.15: except Your chosen servants among them.”

words.translation: He said|Then (it is) the truth|and the truth|I say

translations.1: Qaala falhaqq, walhaqqa aqool
translations.15: Allah concluded, “The truth is—and I ˹only˺ say the truth—

words.translation: Surely I will fill|Hell|with you|and those who|follow you|among them|all

translations.1: La-amla'anna Jahannama minka Wa-mimman tabi'aka minhum ajma'een
translations.15: I will surely fill up Hell with you and whoever follows you from among them, all together.”

words.translation: Say|Not|I ask of you|for it|any|payment|and not|I am|of|the ones who pretend

translations.1: Qul maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrinw Wa-maaa ana minal mutakallifeen
translations.15: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I do not ask you for any reward for this ˹Quran˺, nor do I pretend to be someone I am not

words.translation: Not|it (is)|except|a Reminder|to the worlds

translations.1: In huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen
translations.15: It is only a reminder to the whole world

words.translation: And surely you will know|its information|after|a time

translations.1: Wa-lata'lamunna naba-ahoo ba'da heen
translations.15: And you will certainly know its truth before long.”
